characters.name: Ahana
characters.visualStyle: soft watercolor, warm light, cozy sweaters

pages.text: In the quiet evening, Ahana noticed Papa humming while he warmed milk for Shreya. She tiptoed closer, hugging her plush bunny and listening to the tiny hiccups coming from the bassinet.
pages.imagePrompt: Ahana offering a soft cloth to Papa beside Shreya's cradle
